constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 104 (Friday, June 17, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. ADAMS:
H.R. 8140.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Under Article 1, Section 8 of the Constitution.
[Page H5685]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Committee on Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: HBCU Research, Innovation, Security, and Excellence Act
